about_the_game:
Bring yourself back into the forest of Noel's childhood with the original soundtrack to At Winter's End, composed by Braden Hajer, with album art by Nora Jovine.

Includes:
  • 7 original songs from the game
  • 12 zone-specific versions of the overworld themes
  • A bonus track from the cut sledding minigame!
  • MP3 and WAV formats of all tracks
detailed_description:

name: At Winter's End Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 199 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1180 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Base Package includes both lossy and high-quality lossless formats.
